00020 #ifndef RDK2_REPOSITORY_REMOTEPROPERTYMANAGER
00021 #define RDK2_REPOSITORY_REMOTEPROPERTYMANAGER
00022 
00023 #include <pthread.h>
00024 #include <rdkcore/rnetobjects/rnetmessage.h>
00025 
00026 namespace RDK2 { namespace RepositoryNS {
00027 
00028 class Repository;
00029 class Session;
00030 using RDK2::RNetObjects::RNetMessage;
00031 
00032 class RemotePropertyManager {
00033 public:
00034     RemotePropertyManager(Repository* repository);
00035     ~RemotePropertyManager();
00036 
00037     bool init();
00038     bool start();
00039 
00040 protected:
00041     Repository* const repository;
00042 
00043     volatile bool exiting;
00044 
00045     static void* receiverThreadFn(RemotePropertyManager* me) { me->receiver(); return 0; }
00046     void receiver();
00047     pthread_t receiverThreadId;
00048     Session* receiverSession;
00049 
00050     static void* periodicSenderThreadFn(RemotePropertyManager* me) { me->periodicSender(); return 0; }
00051     void periodicSender();
00052     pthread_t periodicSenderThreadId;
00053     Session* periodicSenderSession;
00054 
00055     static void* periodicUdpRenewalThreadFn(RemotePropertyManager* me) { me->periodicUdpRenewal(); return 0; }
00056     void periodicUdpRenewal();
00057     pthread_t periodicUdpRenewalThreadId;
00058     Session* periodicUdpRenewalSession;
00059 
00060     void manageUpdateMessage(const RNetMessage* msg) throw (SessionException);
00061     void manageSubscriptionMessage(const RNetMessage* msg) throw (SessionException);
00062 
00063     class RemotePropertyManagerInterests : public PosixQueues::MyInterests<RDK2::Object> {
00064     public:
00065         bool areYouInterested(const RDK2::Object* object) {
00066             const RNetObjects::RNetMessage* message;
00067             if ((message = dynamic_cast<const RNetObjects::RNetMessage*>(object))
00068             && (RNetObjects::RNetMessage::PROPERTY_UPDATE == message->getType()
00069             || RNetObjects::RNetMessage::PROPERTY_SUBSCRIPTION == message->getType()))
00070                 return true;
00071             else
00072                 return false;
00073         }
00074     };
00075 };

00077 }}
